issue.title: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke interface method 'void com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable$a.a(com.airbnb.lottie.LottieComposition)' on a null object reference

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
 java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke interface method 'void com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable$a.a(com.airbnb.lottie.LottieComposition)' on a null object reference
at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.setComposition(LottieDrawable.java:216)
at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.setComposition(LottieAnimationView.java:477)
at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView$2.onCompositionLoaded(LottieAnimationView.java:79)
at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieComposition$Factory$ListenerAdapter.onResult(LottieComposition.java:342)
at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieComposition$Factory$ListenerAdapter.onResult(LottieComposition.java:330)
at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieTask.notifySuccessListeners(LottieTask.java:153)
at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieTask$1.run(LottieTask.java:140)
at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:907)
at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:105)
at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:216)
at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:7625)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java)
at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:524)
at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:987)



**What version of Lottie did you test this on?**
v3.0.2
 
**What version of Android did you test this on?**
6.0-10.0

**Steps To Reproduce**

i can't reproduce.

**Screenshots**

@zhuangzhitu I read through the code for ArrayList and ArrayListIterator and I don't see how this could be possible. I have never heard of anybody else having this issue either. If you could provide any repro steps, that would be necessary to fix this.

> @zhuangzhitu I read through the code for ArrayList and ArrayListIterator and I don't see how this could be possible. I have never heard of anybody else having this issue either. If you could provide any repro steps, that would be necessary to fix this.

This is crash, which we use online, about 500 or so, focusing on Android 28,29. I'm not sure how this would happen unless we add a null object to lazyCompositionTasks, but looking at the code is unlikely.

> @zhuangzhitu I read through the code for ArrayList and ArrayListIterator and I don't see how this could be possible. I have never heard of anybody else having this issue either. If you could provide any repro steps, that would be necessary to fix this.

Someone mentioned it. Please have a lookï¼šhttps://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/issues/1407 @gpeal

issue.title: Wrap lazy composition tasks with a null check

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
I can't figure out why this would happen but if it is happening, it's better to potentially have an undesirable animation missing some lazy composition tasks rather than crash.

Fixes https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/issues/1702
